alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:43PM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet with little accumulation below 6500 feet. Up to 3 inches at and above 6500 feet. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on the higher mountain highways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will drop below 6000 feet Saturday night as showers are ending.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
